panels.description: Shows whether the service is running; if DOWN, then at least one instance of the service is unavailable. If UNKNOWN, then there is no data.
panels.title: Состояние сервиса

panels.description: A successful response is considered to be a response with the 2xx code
panels.title: Percentage of successful service responses

targets.expr:
sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_xx{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", envoy_response_code_class=~"2"}[$__interval])) 
/ 
sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_completed{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job"}[$__interval])
) * 100

(
sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_xx{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", envoy_response_code_class=~"5"}[$__interval])) 
- 
sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_timeout{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job"}[$__interval]))
) 
/ 
sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_completed{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job"}[$__interval])
)* 100

sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_xx{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", envoy_response_code_class=~"4"}[$__interval])
)
/
sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_completed{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job"}[$__interval])
) * 100

sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_xx{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job", envoy_response_code_class=~"3"}[$__interval])
)
/
sum(
    increase(envoy_cluster_upstream_rq_completed{envoy_cluster_name="$cluster", instance=~"$instance", job="$job"}[$__interval])
) * 100

panels.title: Percentage of responses from the service

panels.description: Each service has its own verification option. Some can be checked via tcp, others using http request to a specific endpoint
panels.title: Healthcheck
Number of connections to the stand
Total number of active connections to Upstream

panels.description: Number of 429 responses from Envoy, not from Yahoo API
panels.title: VK API Envoy 429
